text: Luigi Arisio (25 March 1926 â€“ 29 September 2020) was an Italian politician. He was a Deputy from 1983 to 1987. Arisio was born in Turin. He was a member of the Italian Republican Party. Arisio died on 29 September 2020 in Turin at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Turin
title: Luigi Arisio
